tables_sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS login_attempts (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, ip_address VARCHAR(255), attempted_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS invitation_codes (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, code VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL, used_by INT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS protokolle (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, datum DATE NOT NULL, gewicht DECIMAL(5,2), schlafqualitaet TINYINT, stress_level TINYINT, energielevel TINYINT, libido_level TINYINT, morgenerektion BOOLEAN, wasser BOOLEAN, verdauung BOOLEAN, tageslicht BOOLEAN, stimulation_solo BOOLEAN, stimulation_partner BOOLEAN, stimulation_porno BOOLEAN, stimulation_edging BOOLEAN, stimulation_kultiviert BOOLEAN, stimulation_prostata BOOLEAN, stimulation_elektro BOOLEAN, ejakulation BOOLEAN, jelqing_min INT, pumping_min INT, ernaehrung_eskaliert BOOLEAN, fruehstueck TEXT, mittagessen TEXT, abendessen TEXT, snacks TEXT, training_gym BOOLEAN, training_einheit_a BOOLEAN, training_einheit_b BOOLEAN, training_einheit_c BOOLEAN, training_ganzkoerper BOOLEAN, training_sport BOOLEAN, training_cardio BOOLEAN, training_bewegung BOOLEAN, training_yoga BOOLEAN, training_pc BOOLEAN, krank_muede BOOLEAN, notizen TEXT, coach_text TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UNIQUE KEY unique_user_date (user_id, datum), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_profiles (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT UNIQUE NOT NULL, track_sex BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, track_pe BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_gym BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_2er_split BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_3er_split BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_ganzkoerper BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_sport BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_cardio BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_bewegung BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_yoga BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, show_training_pc BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, koerperhoehe_cm INT, geburtsjahr YEAR, koerperbau VARCHAR(50), erektion_winkel ENUM('schwach','horizontal','gut','steil'), ernaehrungsweise VARCHAR(100), ernaehrungsplan TEXT, unvertraeglichkeiten TEXT, morgen_routine TEXT, trainingsplan TEXT, zusatz_supplemente TEXT, penis_laenge_cm DECIMAL(4,1), penis_laenge_schambein_cm DECIMAL(4,1), penis_laenge_vakuum_cm DECIMAL(4,1), penis_umfang_cm DECIMAL(4,1), coach_persona ENUM('weiblich_streng','maennlich_drill','neutral') DEFAULT 'neutral', FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id));
CREATE INDEX idx_protokolle_user_datum ON protokolle(user_id, datum DESC);
